titleStmt.title: A sermon tending to peace. Preached before His Majesty, &c. at Newport in the Isle of Wight, during time of this late treaty. By William Haywood D.D. and chaplain in ordinary to His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Haywood, William, 1599 or 1600-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Fr: Neile for Henry Seile,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
